description: Working with Thunderbird, but takes time to update folders and has "connection times outs" quite often.
summary: Working but takes it sweet time

description: I am so happy that the protonmail team provided me the link with the rpm package. I installed it on my redhat system. Tested and working fine. Well done team.
Not much more to say....installation instructions aren't the best, but it is a Beta on linux so it's passable. Either way, up and running and working well.
summary: Works well w/ T-bird on Debian
